news.title: TOM G. FISCHER Is Considering Writing HELLHAMMER's Style Of Music With TRIUMPH OF DEATH
news.summary: "If it doesn't feel right, we're not gonna release it," he says. "And if you ever do this, we will be very, very careful to do it the right way"
